page.title: 12 FIRE POLICE AND AMBULANCE
page.content: Our school caretaker is a part_time{ {fireman.}He is called to a fire by a{ {bleeper}which he wears and it is operated by British Telecom through a transmitter at the fire station.Common sources of fire are cigarette ends, over_heating cooking oil and car fires.A{police constable}showed us his regular issue{inter_comm radio. They always work in twos at night and when necessary, in larger groups.Busy nights are Friday and Saturday dealing with drunken people.There are no major crime or drug problems in our town. Apart from officers,we have 5 women and 28 men constables.{Ambulance-men work a 40 hour week sometimes at night and weekends.They take people to day centres, hospitals and deal with { {accidents}on the roads and beaches. They are very{skilled}and can comfort the patient until a doctor arrives.
